Name: IP Kimchi Stew
Steps: Add everything into IP and meat option x 30 min with quick release
Decrease Hot Pepper paste to taste

Name: IP Meat Stew
Steps: Sear Beef
Add all ingredients to IP
Set to Meat setting x 25min.
Enjoy with rice
Notes: Quick and hearty.  A favorite of ours!

Name: Drumstick Marinade
Ingredients: 1 teaspoon of Oregano, Paprika, Garlic powder, Onion Powder, Worcestershire sauce, Dijon Mustard
1/2 teaspoon of Black Pepper, salt, thyme
Steps: Mix all in a mixing bowl and add to chicken
Set in fridge for at least 1 hr
Drumsticks in air fryer 380F x 19min to an internal temp of 175-180F

Name: Air Fry - Costco garlic drumsticks
Steps: Air Fry @ 400 x 16min
Flip, then 8 min more for internal temp of 178

Name: Chicken Noodle - Stock
Steps: Brown chicken carcass in non-finishing pot
Add 4 quarts water and bring to boil
Add 3 tspn each of Olive oil, salt, & pepper with 3 bay leaves
Boil for at least 1 hr
Drain into another/finishing pot with collander. This pot to be used to complete Soup

Name: Chicken Noodle - Soup
Steps: Brown 1 onion, 4 large carrots, 4 celery with 2 tablespn butter
Then add 1 tspn each garlic, rosemary/dill, & garlic
Boil at least 20 min
Then add chicken and boil at least 15min
Cook noodles if desired separately and add at the end

Name: Pizza Dough
Ingredients: Bread Flour (pref), 11 oz. Can use all-purp, but this has more protein for text
Steps: Add 11 oz Flour to mixing bowl
Add 1 teaspo salt, 1 teaspo Instant Yeast
Then add water 110F, warmth will help
Put flour on hands and then Mix by HAND until stringy. Won't take long
Spray oil in a mixing bowl, Then put dough on.  Spray oil over dough to help prevent film. Fridge for 12-24 hrs

Name: Pan Pizza
Ingredients: For Sauce #1: 1 can tomatoes drained and crushed
1/4 teaspoon: salt, sugar, oregano, crushed pepper
For Sauce #2: 28 oz can Peeled tomato can drained
1/2 teaspoon: Sugar, Black Pepper, Red Pepper
Steps: Pull Dough out of fridge x 90min
2-3 tablespo EVO in cast iron pan with a small amount of bread crumbs
Add sauce and ingredients you want
400F oven x 27.5 min.
Take out and check the bottom, finish on stove
Cool before eating
Notes: Thin ingredients will take 27.5 min. More will take longer.

Name: IP Butter Chicken
Ingredients: Heavy Cream or full-fat coconut milk, 4 oz
Steps: Add everything into IP EXCEPT FOR Butter, cream and 1 tsp Garam Masala
Cook in IP for 10 min on HI with 10 min natural release
Open pot after natural release, remove chicken to shred
Blend everything inside pot
Add up the remaining ingredients, then add chicken
Serve over carb
Notes: Note: NO extra liquid is needed as chicken and tomatoes already have it.

Name: IP Chicken Tortilla Soup
Steps: Saute in IP x 15m- Corn, tomatoes, onion, beans, chile, garlic, spices
Added chicken & broth.  High Pressure x 20min
Serve over carb

Name: Miso Glazed Cod
Steps: Cook Cod - Oven: 400F x 18-22 min.  Conv Oven: 375F x 17-19min.
Add ingredients into a pot and boil
Serve over carb

Name: Garlic Shrimp
Steps: Melt butter with EVO
Add garlic and saute for 1 min
Add in everything except for shrimp/parsely/lemon juice.  Simmer x 5 min
Add in Shrimp until cooked
Add in parsley and lemon juice
Serve over carb

Name: Kimbap
Steps: Rinse the Spinach and parboil (rapid boil) for 30s - 1 min.
Drain water and add 1/8 teasp salt and 1/2 Tablesp sesame oil. Mix well
Cook the egg and cut into long strips
Lightly cook carrots, crab sticks and meat
Place cooked rice in mixing bowl & add 1/2 Tablespo sesame oil & 1/4 teasp fine sea salt
Place 1 dried nori sheet on bamboo mat. Spread rice thinly to cover 2/3 on lower part
Fill with ingredients
Use water and/or rice grain to help stick the nori

Name: Crispy Chicken Parmesan
Steps: Whisk eggs, garlic, parsley, salt & pepper to taste, in a shallow dish
Add chicken to egg to coat, then into mix of bread crumbs, chees & garlic powder
Fry until golden/ 165F
Top chicken with sauce
Notes: For sauce, fry onion in a pot until transparent, then garlic for 30 sec.  Then add the tomato puree and salt & pepper to tase with italian herbs and sugar

Name: Pico De Gallo
Ingredients: Lime Juice, 1/4 cup (less 'juicy') - 1/2 cup. Most important, use fresh limes ~3-6 for best
Steps: Prep and remove stems from tomatoes. Prep Onions and jalapeno
Chop Cilantro and Jalapeno to almost fine chop(S-chop in processor).
Add Onion to processor to finish to fine chop
Put everything in mixing bowl and add lime juice, salt
Dice tomatoes, strain, and add to mixing bowl
Marinate for at least 2 hours
Notes: 2 batch fills 68oz- 2 medium Ikea Mason jar

Name: Roased Broccoli
Steps: Wash broccoli and pat dry.  Drier = crispier
Air fry/ convection oven 360F x 8-10 min
